name: Huawei | VRP | Chassis | CPU | CPU Usage Above Threshold (SYSLOG)

name: Huawei | VRP | Chassis | CPU | CoPP Drop (SYSLOG)

patterns.value_re: CPCAR_DROP_MPU\(l\)\[\d+\]:Some packets are dropped by cpcar on the MPU.+Protocol=(?P<proto>\S+), Drop-Count=(?P<count>\S+)\)$
